text:
League 1
Levante - Bar√ßa: news of Luis Suarez!
Hit in the defeat of Barcelona against Levante (3-1), Les Blaugrana gave news of their Uruguayan striker, Luis Suarez.
02 Nov 2019, 18:20 by Hugo Deloraine



This is a meeting to forget for FC Barcelona. In addition to taking the water against Levante (3-1 defeat), the Blaugrana lost Uruguayan forward Luis Suarez. He had to give way to Carles Perez in the 41st minute.




The club's press release




Suarez and his teammates + 8 üì∑Credit Photo - Icon Sport

A few minutes after the end of the game, the club gave news of his 32-year-old player. "Luis Suarez has a problem with his right calf, and when he arrives in Barcelona he will be tested to determine the exact extent of his injury." Hoping this is not too serious for Liverpool's former striker.



¬†Luis Suarez: all information about the player
